name: Hospital Black River
description:
MOVE -- W,A,S,D || INTERACT -- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
JUMP/CLIMB -- SPACE || CROUCH - CTRL || RUN - SHIFT

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HospitalBlackRiver/

[PT/BR] Um estranho hospital no meio do nada chamado Black River, relatos e pertubações aos arredores do hospital, há muitos anos o hospital já havia fechado porém você terá que investigar oque está acontecendo lá dentro, segredos dos médicos, segredos perturbadores, criaturas misticas ou paranormais ?, isso foram apenas os boatos.

[ENG] A strange hospital in the middle of nowhere called Black River, reports and disturbances around the hospital, many years ago the hospital had already closed but will you have to investigate what's going on inside, doctor secrets, disturbing secrets, mystical or paranormal creatures? , that was just the rumors.
